```{r}
# load libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(leaflet)
library(sf)
```

Data source: https://www.ospo.noaa.gov/Products/land/hms.html#data 

```{r}
# read in smoke data on 1/1/2011 from NOAA

wildfire = st_read("wildfire_data/hms_smoke20110101/hms_smoke20110101.shp")
wildfire

# reproject
wildfire_WGS84 <- st_transform(wildfire, 4326)

# map
leaflet(data = wildfire_WGS84) %>% 
  addTiles()
```
